text: Abstraction consists of showing the essential parts of the different elements of a class and ignore the other GITGE] parts. Examples: dog, cat, human, tree... ] This can be achieved in Java with abstract clases: Bird \YEININEL abstract class Animal { public abstract void animalSound(); ] public void sleep() { System.out.printin("Zzz"); } Penguin Nl Dog } Condor Tiger Or with interfaces which is used to bundle similar objects: interface Animal { // interface methods (do not have a body) public void animalSound(); public void run(); } 38!
